text: wmn yatlub dynana ghyr din al'islam aldhy hu alastslam lilah baltwhyd walanqyad lah baltaet, walebwdyt, walirasulih alnabii alkhatm muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam bial'iiman bih wbmtabeth wmhbth zahrana wbatnana, falan yuqbl minh dhlk, wahu fi alakhirat min alkhasirin aladhin bkhsu 'anfusahum hzwzha
